io.name: jmims.entity.kf06.kft.ECommHeader

<sequence> <element name="tgrmLen"> <annotation> <documentation>전문길이</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="전문+길이" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:msg_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="tgrmId"> <annotation> <documentation>전문ID</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="전문ID" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:msg_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="tgrmCntn"> <annotation> <documentation>전문내용</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="전문내용" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <element name="trdGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>거래구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="거래구분코드" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:msg_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="tgrmSendDtm"> <annotation> <documentation>전문전송일시</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="전문전송일시" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <element name="tgrmTrcNo"> <annotation> <documentation>전문추적번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="전문추적번호" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
